alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:04AM CST until February 19 at 6:27PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. .Heavy rainfall received last last night and early today will cause the river to rise above flood stage. For the Big Piney River...including Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, flood waters affect the lower TA 250 Training Area and Highway J east of Fort Wood East Gage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 3.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 12.0 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. Friday morning at 815 AM CST.
